newsitem.title: UK: CLM seen extending HCG offer again.
newsitem.headline: CLM seen extending HCG offer again.

text.p: CLM Insurance Fund, the Lloyd's corporate capital vehicle whose proposed merger with HCG Lloyd's Investment Trust was hijacked by an offer for HCG from Benfield & Rea Investment Trust, is expected by analysts to again extend the deadline for shareholders to accept its own offer.
Since BRIT posted its offer document last Thursday night, nothing more has been heard, except a recommendation from CLM that HCG shareholders accept its 72 million stg offer.
The BRIT document valued its bid at 80.5 million stg.
CLM declined to comment on what its intentions were. Its offer was extended last week and is due to expire on Thursday.
